mistral:7b-instruct: This CBHS Health Fund EPO plan fits your profile as it offers comprehensive coverage for essential health services you require, such as hospitalization for heart disease and stroke, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and maternity care. With a high coverage of $750,000, this plan is suitable for managing the costs associated with multiple chronic conditions like hypertension, diabetes, and shortness of breath. Although the monthly premium is higher at $320, the affordable Max Out-of-Pocket limit of $5,000 will help you manage your healthcare expenses within an upper-middle income bracket while maintaining a balanced risk level (100).
